text: is there a way to fetch all hubdb tables and upload them to another portal? (all tables have foreignIds to other tables, fetching them one by one will break those connections)

There is not, but you may be able to use the API to write a script that automates the recreation of the tables in the new portal, repopulates the non-linked data, and then create a map of the old IDs to the new IDs to complete the foreign ID cells
what happens when you run `hs accounts list`?
